Handler to manage the routes: - /delete/:schema/:name A request will only be forwarded to this handler if its URL exactly matches this structure.

GetTablesHandler - Class in handlers
Handler to manage the routes: - /tables/schemaName - /tables If a schema is not provided, the response contains the list of all tables for all schemas.
